author: Cory Evans
title: chevron-right
text: LITTLE ROCK (KATV) — The human remains found off [ Highway 7 North ](https://katv.com/news/local/suspected-human-remains-found-off-arkansas-highway-north-garland-county-sheriffs-office-gcso-criminal-investigations-division-cid-coroners-office-arkansas-state-crime-laboratory-lab-hot-springs-police-department-hspd-amir-ellis-identification-dna-testing#)in Garland County have been identified as the remains of 19-year-old Amir Ellis. Police confirmed that Ellis' remains were found in the woods off Highway 7 North near Blackmon Road. The Garland County Sheriff's Office originally was sent to the location on Dec. 18 as human remains were possibly found. Authorities responded, collected the remains, and sent them to the Arkansas State Crime Lab where they were identified as Ellis'. Since his disappearance, his mother, Jessica Ellis, had been searching for him and rallying volunteers to her cause. Ellis was originally reported missing to the Hot Springs Police Department back [on March 17.](https://katv.com/news/local/hot-springs-police-searching-for-missing-20-year-old-hspd-amir-isaiah-ellis-rocky-reef-circle-detective-branstentter-garland-county-arkansas-detective-branstentter-black-male-standing-5-feet-6-inches-weighing-160-pounds-with-black-hair-brown-eyes) In May, police confirmed that he had been kidnapped with [Three teens](https://katv.com/news/local/hot-springs-police-release-information-on-missing-20-year-old-amir-ellis-18-year-old-nathaniel-speed-18-year-old-alexia-chambers-three-suspect-juvenile-detective-brian-branstetter-hspd-fort-smith-police-department-gag-order-issued-garland-county-circuit) being arrested and charged.

author: @remarca
title: В Крыму зафиксирован случай заражения гельминтами через комара | Health | Seldon News
text: Первый случай дирофиляриоза выявлен на полуострове В Крыму зарегистрирован первый случай заражения паразитическими червями (гельминтами) через укус комара. Об этом сообщает Telegram-канал «Жесть Крым Симферополь Севастополь», ссылаясь на местный Центр гигиены и эпидемиологии. Речь идет о заболевании дирофиляриозом, которое обычно поражает животных, но иногда встречается и у людей. Черви рода Dirofilaria могут обнаруживаться под кожей, а также в органах зрения. В Центре гигиены и эпидемиологии отметили, что появление дирофиляриоза связано с благоприятными для размножения переносчиков... Copyright information of photo and video materials was taken from the website «ИА «remarca.ru»» , more details in our Terms of Service

author: Pablo Javier Piacente
title: La IA podría producir hasta 5 millones de toneladas de residuos electrónicos en 10 años
text: Intelixencia Artificial / Informática A IA podería producir ata 5 millóns de toneladas de residuos electrónicos en 10 anos O cálculo dos científicos inclúe elementos de hardware como as unidades de procesamiento, de almacenamento e os sistemas de alimentación Pablo Javier Piacente A Intelixencia Artificial (IA) depende de melloras tecnolóxicas rápidas, incluída a infraestrutura de hardware e os chips. As actualizacións necesarias para seguir o ritmo do crecemento da tecnoloxía poderían agravar os problemas existentes en canto á acumulación de refugallos electrónicos: ao xerar que os equipos se volvan obsoletos cada vez con maior rapidez, os refugallos poderían multiplicarse e crear un novo problema ambiental. Un novo estudo publicado recentemente na revista Nature Computational Science suxire que a expansión da Intelixencia Artificial (IA) generativa, que marca a evolución desta tecnoloxía, e principalmante os modelos lingüísticos de gran tamaño (LLM), poderían producir entre 1,2 e 5 millóns de toneladas de lixo electrónico acumulado entre 2020 e 2030. Nun escenario de crecente complexidade en canto á xestión dos refugallos informáticos, os residuos producidos pola IA poderían agravar este inconveniente. A IA generativa é capaz de crear textos, imaxes ou outros medios en resposta a comandos: aínda que xa se atopa en desenvolvemento, promete unha intensa evolución nos próximos anos. Con todo, require recursos informáticos substanciais para a capacitación e inferencia do modelo: fronte a isto, aínda non se abordaron as implicacións dos refugallos electrónicos que poida xerar e as súas estratexias de xestión. Problemas críticos de sustentabilidade Os autores do novo estudo, da Academia Chinesa de Ciencias e a Universidade Reichman en Israel, presentan un marco de análise de fluxo de materiais, baseado na potencia computacional, para cuantificar e explorar formas de administrar os refugallos electrónicos producidos pola [IA generativa](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/11/01/ia-procesar-ilusiones-opticas-cerebro-111096954.html), cun enfoque centrado nos modelos de linguaxe grande. Vale recordar que estes modelos son os máis utilizados nas aplicacións masivas e están detrás dos chatbots como ChatGPT ou Gemini, entre outros. De acordo a un [artigo](https://www.sciencealert.com/scientists-predict-ai-to-generate-millions-of-tons-of-e-waste) publicado en Science Alert, as necesidades tecnolóxicas destes sistemas expoñen problemas críticos de sustentabilidade, incluído o consumo de enerxía e a pegada de carbono asociados con estas operacións. A isto hai que sumarlle unha realidade relacionada co consumo hogareño: se a IA generarativa acelera a obsolescencia dos equipos, teremos ao mesmo tempo unha multiplicación dos residuos electrónicos. Como lograr unha IA verdadeiramente sostible? Segundo [informa](https://www.aiwire.net/2024/11/06/the-growing-e-waste-footprint-of-genai/#:~:text=While%20the%20threat%20of%20e,memory%20units%2C%20and%20storage%20drives) Aiwire, en 2022 producíronse 62 millóns de toneladas de refugallos electrónicos a nivel global, un dato que representa un aumento do 82 % con respecto aos niveis de 2010. Se esta tendencia mantense, prevese que a xeración mundial de refugallos informáticos aumente nun 32 % adicional, chegando potencialmente a 82 millóns de toneladas para 2030. Os cálculos do novo estudo agregan outros posibles 5 millóns de toneladas producidos especificamente polo avance da IA. Para rematar, o profesor Shaolei Ren, da Universidade de California en Riverside, en Estados Unidos, quen non participou da investigación, indicou nunha [publicación](https://sciencemediacentre.es/la-expansion-de-la-ia-generativa-podria-generar-hasta-cinco-millones-de-toneladas-de-basura) de Science Media Centre España que “a previsión do documento é un indicador razoable dos residuos electrónicos que probablemente xerará a IA generativa. Trátase dunha cuestión crítica, aínda que a miúdo pásase por alto, á hora de considerar o futuro impacto social da [IA generativa](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/11/10/ia-cambiar-opinion-creyentes-fervorosos-108219108.html). Ademais de invitar a un debate máis profundo, a investigación destaca o papel crucial dunha economía circular para lograr unha IA verdadeiramente sostible”, concluíu Ren. Referencia [E-waste challenges of generative artificial intelligence](https://www.nature.com/articles/s43588-024-00712-6). Peng Wang et ao. Nature Computational Science (2024). author: jameslangton
title: Who will fill the void as foreign workers depart?
text:
With the federal government seeking to curb the economic strains of recent population growth, the crop of temporary foreign workers is expected to decline. This shift is likely to create labour challenges for certain sectors, says Desjardins Group.
Policy action to reduce the number of non‑permanent residents in Canada is expected to slow real GDP growth while curbing inflation, particularly shelter costs, Desjardins said in a report.
Simultaneously, the presence of fewer temporary foreign workers should also boost wage growth as the number of young workers declines and unemployment and job vacancies rise, the report said.
Higher wages should, in theory, entice workers to fill the jobs that are currently being done by temporary foreign workers. However, the report said, “there is little evidence of people waiting on the sidelines to work.”
As a result, the sectors that rely most heavily on temporary foreign workers — such as accommodation and food services and retail trade — will likely face the biggest hit from a policy reducing the availability of this cheap labour source, the report suggested.
These sectors are already hurting as they were among the hardest hit by the pandemic, and they’ve seen a surge of insolvencies so far this year, the report noted.
“High borrowing and input costs, on top of elevated debt levels coming out of the pandemic, have weighed on these industries even in an environment of ample and relatively inexpensive temporary labour,” the report said. “For sectors of the economy that emerged from the pandemic battered and bruised, the federal government’s plan to reduce [temporary foreign worker] admissions will make an already challenging situation even more difficult.”
Some companies in these sectors may innovate and improve productivity in response to the lack of low-cost labour. “Unfortunately, others will not, posing ongoing challenges to Canadian businesses,” the report said.

author: Diego Guadalupe
title: EOS Crypto Rallies 20% - ¿Qué hay detrás del aumento y puede durar?
text:
Noticias
EOS Crypto Rallies 20% – ¿Qué hay detrás del aumento y puede durar?
- EOS se recuperó más del 20%, impulsado por el cambio de marca a Vaulta, altos rendimientos y derivados alcistas
- Dominio social se disparó pero luego se enfrió; El precio de EOS todavía se mantiene estable con una fuerte presión de compra
[Eos [EOS]](https://ambcrypto.com/predictions) está haciendo olas en el mercado, reuniendo más del 20% y saliendo comerciantes zumbaG sobre su transformación en Vaulta.
Con rendimientos de replanteo preparados para eclipsar [Ethereum[ETH]](https://ambcrypto.com/predictions) y [Solana[SOL]](https://ambcrypto.com/predictions) Y los comerciantes de derivados que apostan a lo grande por más al alza, EOS está arrojando su pasado estancado y entrando en el centro de atención. Pero, ¿es sostenible la exageración, o la toma de ganancias pondrá una tapa en las ganancias?
Catalizadores detrás de la oleada de EOS
El reciente rally de cripto de EOS se remonta a tres factores clave. Primero, el zumbido en torno al inminente cambio de marca de EOS a Vaulta está atrayendo la atención de los inversores.
Establecido en el lanzamiento a fines de mayo de 2025, Vaulta tiene como objetivo transformar EOS en un centro bancario con motor blockchain, completo con un nuevo ticker e integración continua con Exsat, las soluciones bancarias de Bitcoin.
En segundo lugar, la introducción de un rendimiento de replanteo de alrededor del 17% para el nuevo token de Vaulta es significativamente mayor que el 2.03% de Ethereum y el 5.14% de Solana, respaldado por un grupo de recompensas de aproximadamente 250 millones de tokens.
Por último, Los comerciantes de derivados muestran una creciente confianza en EOS. Según los datos de Coinglass, el interés abierto (OI) en EOS Futures ha visto un fuerte aumento, alcanzando un máximo reciente de aproximadamente $ 170 millones.
Esto representa un salto significativo desde el nivel de $ 90 millones registrado hace solo unas semanas, señalando un fuerte sentimiento alcista.
Además, los datos destacan el aumento de los precios de EOS junto con el aumento de OI, lo que sugiere que los comerciantes se están posicionando para obtener mayores ganancias, impulsados por la emoción de cambio de marca continua y los incentivos atractivos.
La multitud se está dando cuenta
El dominio social de EOS también ha visto un aumento notable después del aumento en la actividad de derivados. Los datos de Santiment revelan que la métrica saltó a casi el 2.8% a medida que el precio de EOS subió por encima de $ 0.80, alcanzando su nivel más alto en meses.
Este aumento en la actividad social destaca la creciente alineación entre el interés minorista e institucional, impulsado por la anticipación del próximo cambio de marca de Vaulta.
Sin embargo, desde entonces se ha enfriado a alrededor del 0,35%, lo que sugiere que si bien el zumbido inicial fue intenso, puede estar disminuyendo.
Aún así, el precio sigue siendo resistente, insinuando que el impulso del rally podría persistir si el sentimiento social se vuelve a subir.
Perspectiva de precio de EOS
Esta es una traducción automática de nuestra versión en inglés.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Synergy Credit Union Partners with Kuusoft to Enhance Customer Experience | User | times-online.com
text: Synergy Credit Union Partners with Kuusoft to Elevate Member Experience with NexSigns Digital Signage Solutions. Kuusoft , a leading provider of digital signage solutions, proudly announces a strategic partnership with Synergy Credit Union , a prominent retail credit union based in Saskatchewan, Canada. The collaboration aims to elevate the member experience through the deployment of Kuusoft's innovative digital signage product, NexSigns. Synergy Credit Union is a customer-centric retail bank dedicated to serving the financial needs of its members. With a commitment to fostering strong community relationships, Synergy Credit Union delivers a wide range of financial products and services, emphasizing personalized solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of its diverse membership. As a retail credit union, Synergy Credit Union operates in the financial services industry, serving the residents of Saskatchewan. The credit union has a strong presence in the region, with a network of branches strategically located to offer accessible financial services to its members. The decision to partner with Kuusoft and implement NexSigns was led by Camanie Glynn, Marketing Technology Specialist. The digital signage solution will be utilized across all ten branches, including several video walls and a large LED panel at the main branch in Lloydminster, Saskatchewan. The primary objective is to enhance customer engagement by showcasing rate information and marketing materials through dynamic digital displays. The deployment of NexSigns replaces Synergy Credit Union's previous digital signage provider, offering a more user-friendly solution. Synergy Credit Union faced challenges with their previous digital signage vendor: slow response times and a lack of proactive support. Camanie Glynn highlighted the frustration of dealing with ongoing issues and the need for a simpler setup that allows the credit union to focus on serving its members. "We envision having a consistent point of contact who truly understands our systems and has the tools to let us focus on what we do best, without constantly dealing with digital display issues," said Camanie Glynn. Synergy Credit Union chose Kuusoft for its commitment to providing a comprehensive solution aligned with the credit union's vision. The NexSigns digital signage platform with video wall hardware, offers a user-friendly experience, allowing for efficient content management and reducing the need for hands-on troubleshooting. With all ten locations now using NexSigns, Synergy Credit Union looks forward to a positive and collaborative partnership with Kuusoft. The implementation aligns with the credit union's goal of delivering a seamless customer experience while streamlining its digital signage operations. About Kuusoft: Kuusoft is a leading provider of digital signage solutions, offering innovative products and services designed to transform communication in various industries. With a focus on delivering dynamic and engaging content, Kuusoft empowers businesses to connect with their audiences effectively. To learn more, please visit www.kuusoft.com or call 604-639-7055. About Synergy Credit Union: It has been serving communities since 1943. Dedicated to making life and community prosperous. For Synergy, it’s about connection and doing the right thing. Synergy builds relationships beyond banking. Media Contact Company Name: Kuusoft Corp. Contact Person: Kuusoft Marketing Email: Send Email Phone: 604-639-7055 Address:235-5589 Byrne Rd. City: Burnaby State: British Columbia Country: Canada Website: https://www.kuusoft.com/

author: ansa.it
title: Christ found in those who are demeaned by arrogance - Pope - Vatican - Ansa.it
text:
Christ is to be found in all those who are stripped of their dignity and demeaned by arrogance, injustice and power says Pope Francis in his meditations for the Via Crucis, released ahead of the Good Friday liturgy at the Colosseum in Rome on Friday evening.
 "Teach me to see you in those who suffer, for you are there, and in those stripped of their dignity, demeaned by the arrogance, injustice and power of those who exploit the poor amid general indifference," prays the pope in his reflection for the ninth Station of the Cross. .
 "Now I know why you insisted on identifying yourself with those in need," continued Francis.
 "You too were imprisoned; you too were a stranger, led outside the city to be crucified. You too were naked, stripped of your clothes. You too were sick and wounded; on the cross, you too were thirsty and hungered for love," he added.
 The Pope also reflects on the "women of Jerusalem", who "have no voice, yet they make their presence felt".
 "Help us to recognize the dignity of those women who remained faithful and stood by you in your passion, and those who in our own day are exploited and endure injustice and indignity," he says.
 In his closing invocations the pope also prays for all those who are suffering persecution and war.
 "May this prayer of intercession embrace our brothers and sisters who in so many parts of the world are suffering persecution on account of your name; those who experience the trauma of war, and all those who look to you for the strength to bear their heavy crosses," says Francis.

author: Carlos Palermo
title: Vídeo: cinturão de campeão do UFC é furtado nos EUA e caso viraliza
text:
Henry Cejudo , campeão do UFC nas categorias peso mosca (56,7 kg) e peso galo (61,2 kg), teve um de seus cinturões roubado na madrugada de terça-feira (8), nos Estados Unidos .
O cinturão roubado foi o primeiro conquistado por Cejudo, em 2018 , e estava guardado em seu estúdio, juntamente com outros itens pessoais relacionados ao lutador. Segundo o relato de Dylan Rush, produtor de Cejudo, o roubo aconteceu às 4h45 da manhã enquanto ele dormia no local.
Confira o vídeo
Relato do produtor Rush contou que acordou ao ver um homem parado no estúdio e pensou que fosse Cejudo. “Acordei e vi o cara parado lá por 2 minutos, pensando que era o Henry, porque estava escuro. Aí ouvi um estrondo, a prateleira caiu e o cara saiu correndo”, explicou Rush.
Henry Cejudo, que conquistou uma medalha de ouro em luta livre nos Jogos Olímpicos de Pequim 2008, estreou no UFC em 2014. Ele venceu seu primeiro cinturão em 2018 e o segundo em 2019, após subir para a categoria peso galo.
Possível aposentadoria Ex-campeão peso-mosca, Cejudo pode estar em seus últimos dias na carreira de lutador. Em recente entrevista ao site ‘MMA Junkie’, o atleta confidenciou que a lesão sofrida no olho, durante o confronto contra Song Yadong, ainda não está 100%.
Por conta disso, ele passou a repensar se vale a pena continuar competindo sem conseguir dar o máximo de si dentro do octógono.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->robbery and theft

author: La-Croix.com
title: En Europe, le loup reste une "espèce protégée", mais moins qu'avant
text:
Les eurodéputés entérinent jeudi le déclassement du statut du loup, qui sera désormais sur le territoire de l’UE une espèce « protégée » et non plus « strictement protégée », une évolution dénoncée par des défenseurs de la biodiversité.
Le texte, transposant dans le droit européen les récentes modifications de la Convention de Berne sur la conservation de la vie sauvage, doit être adopté à la mi-journée, en session plénière à Strasbourg.
Il devrait être soutenu par une majorité constituée de la droite (PPE), des socialistes et démocrates (groupe S&D) et des libéraux et centristes de Renew.
Les Verts et le groupe de La Gauche, qui déplorent une décision « politique et non scientifique », devraient voter contre.
« La dégradation de la protection du loup ignore les outils efficaces de coexistence et risque de transformer la protection de la nature en un jeu politique. Elle flatte la peur plutôt que les faits », a dénoncé l’élu allemand Sebastian Everding, au nom de La Gauche.
« L’UE abandonne le loup à son triste sort », avait regretté l’organisation WWF à l’automne 2024, quand le comité permanent de la convention de Berne s’apprêtait à dégrader le statut de protection.
Concrètement, cette évolution législative dans l’Union européenne va faciliter les tirs et l’abattage de loups dans les régions rurales et montagneuses où la proximité de l’animal avec bétail et chiens de troupeau est jugée trop menaçante.
« Les Etats membres resteront responsables des plans de gestion du loup, mais disposeront de davantage de souplesse qu’aujourd’hui, j’espère que cela va faciliter la coexistence », a déclaré Herbert Dorfmann, eurodéputé italien du PPE, en conférence de presse.
Le PPE, premier groupe du Parlement et famille politique de la présidente de la Commission Ursula von der Leyen, est à l’initiative sur ce sujet.
Ce parti a présenté le texte soumis à la plénière comme l’aboutissement d’un travail de trois ans, né du constat d’« une augmentation des conflits entre loups et éleveurs ».
« Menace permanente »
Depuis la directive de 1992 interdisant leur élimination, la population de loups est en hausse sur le continent européen, au point d’atteindre les 20.300 individus recensés dans l’UE en 2023.
Cette année-là, Ursula von der Leyen est montée au créneau pour dénoncer le « réel danger » que constituent les meutes de loups pour le bétail dans certaines régions.
La responsable allemande a elle-même subi la perte d’un vieux poney, tué en septembre 2022 dans la propriété familiale du nord de l’Allemagne après qu’un loup se soit introduit dans son enclos.
Il n’y a pas encore eu de drame humain à cause du loup, mais des éleveurs et leur famille ont peur, ont insisté mercredi des élus du PPE.
« Plus de 60.000 animaux d’élevage sont attaqués chaque année dans l’UE », a appuyé l’Espagnole Esther Herranz Garcia, qui a négocié le texte pour son groupe.
L’extrême droite pourrait mêler ses voix à celles de la majorité, au moins en partie.
« Ceux qui nourrissent notre pays ne peuvent continuer à travailler avec cette menace permanente », a fait valoir Valérie Deloge (Les Patriotes), élue française se proclamant « députée et éleveuse ».
Associés à la démarche, selon la procédure dite du « vote accéléré », sans débat préalable dans l’hémicycle, les socialistes et les centristes ont voulu dédramatiser.
« On ne délivre pas un permis de tuer, on donne plus de latitude pour des dérogations locales, le loup reste une espèce protégée », a souligné à l’AFP l’ancien ministre français Pascal Canfin, eurodéputé de Renew.

author: Alison Paterson
title: Japanese encephalitis hits Queensland piggeries but vaccine close
text:
More cases of Japanese encephalitis virus have been detected in Queensland piggeries, with nearly one-third of the state's facilities thought to be infected.
However, industry leaders are optimistic a vaccine developed in Queensland to protect animals from the zoonotic disease that can cause reproductive issues in pigs will be approved for use in Australia soon.
Biosecurity Queensland revealed on March 5 that the disease, spread from the bite of an infected mosquito, continued to be detected at piggeries across the state.
It indicated that JEV was established in mainland Australia, with the transmission risks likely to vary seasonally and between years depending on weather and other local factors, and transmitted to humans and pigs by mosquitoes and has been identified in agricultural regions with significant water sources or after rainfall events.
Australian Pork Limited CEO Margo Andrae said with the anticipated rain from Tropical Cyclone Alfred to fall across the state's south east, pork graziers needed to be alert, even in areas with no previous JEV detections.
"JEV is fairly widespread in SEQ," Ms Andrae said.
"Between 20 per cent and 30 per cent of piggeries are estimated to be infected, so we ask people on farms to remain vigilant and protect animals and staff during this cyclone.
"The key issue with JEV is the bad guy here is the mosquito,"
However, Ms Andrae said JEV did not impact the meat's taste.
"Pork is completely safe to eat," she said.
"People can still enjoy delicious Queensland pork."
Hopefully, a new animal vaccine will shortly be available, Ms Andrae said.
"While there's no vaccine for pigs here at this stage, we have been working with the University of Queensland and several regulars, including the Australian Pesticides and Veterinary Medicines Authority," she said.
"We have been working with regulators such as the APVMA, and it is pretty close to being available.
"We are also exploring international animal vaccines and are investigating if it would be easier and quicker to bring these in; Japan, not surprisingly, has a good vaccine, so we are exploring global options."
Ms Andrae said the state's pork industry had been working closely with Queensland Health to make it easier for people to access the free human JEV vaccine.
SunPork Group CEO and managing director Dr Robert van Barneveld said he felt that, as the producer of 20 per cent of Australia's pork and the country's largest single supplier, the company was well prepared for the latest round of JEV.
"At the moment, any production impacts are yet to be ascertained, but it does not seem extensive," Mr van Barneveld said.
"This is our second wave of JEV after it was found here three years ago.
"Now JEV is endemic to the east coast of Australia and is still a notifiable emergency animal disease because of the impact on humans."
Mr van Barneveld said some pigs appeared to develop a limited resistance to JEV.
"Once a sow and gilets are exposed, there seems to be a level of passive immunity in some animals," he said.
"The infected mosquito has to bite the female pig at a certain stage of her gestation to affect her gilts, so it's a window in a window."
A Biosecurity Queensland spokesperson said people couldn't catch JEV directly from infected animals.
JEV cannot be transmitted human-to-human or human-to-mosquito.
"If you suspect an animal is showing signs of JEV, you must report it to your local veterinarian or BQ on 13 25 23," the spokesperson said.
"If your veterinarian believes your animals may have JEV, they will take samples and submit them for testing at a government laboratory."
JEV can also cause neurological signs in horses (incoordination, difficulty swallowing, impaired vision), so all pig and horse owners should be alert to this virus.
